nodes.text: Asora was a female Farghul, who lived on Cularin during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Asora owned a shop in Hedrett called Asora's Sweet Surprise, that specialized in selling cooking ingredients. A group of Devaronians working for Melo Centris traveled to her shop and purchased some cooking ingredients from her. Shortly afterward, Asora witnessed them shooting Carilla, a Human who owned a nearby shop.
